tasks.title: Add Quick-Generate Toggle to Audio Tool
tasks.description: Implement a toggle to bypass the script review step for faster generation.
tasks.details:
1. **UI Update**: Add a 'Review Script' switch to the Audio Generator form (default: true).
2. **Logic Update**: In the `handleGenerate` function, check the switch state. If false, chain `generateScript` and `synthesizeAudio` automatically without stopping at the review step.
tasks.testStrategy: Toggle OFF -> Click Generate -> Verify it goes straight to audio. Toggle ON -> Click Generate -> Verify it stops at script review.
